author: Wilson Wong
title: DJ Jazzy Jeff tells Will Smith he suffered memory loss while fighting pneumonia
description: “I got into bed, and I don’t remember the next 10 days,” the music producer said on Will Smith’s Snapchat show.
content:
While battling coronavirus-like symptoms, DJ Jazzy Jeff told longtime friend Will Smith that he experienced a health scare: memory loss.
Jeff said he experienced symptoms after returning home from a trip and rested in bed for 10 days. I had a temperature tha… [+834 chars]
